short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test Websocket connections with ease, supports both secure (wss) and unsecure (ws) protocols.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool compliments the online WebSocket tester tool at our website (https://www.piehost.com/websocket-tester) 

Since modern browsers do not support connecting to an un-secure  host, users who need to test their WebSocket servers with ws:// protocol may use this extension.
